author: celtic.warrior
content: What's the solution to the missed slot problem?  Is there a way to ask the relays to block Titan Builder until their issue is fixed and then announce to the staking community which relays have done so so that we can enable those only?

author: tersec
content: the first part is supposed to happen automatically

author: celtic.warrior
content: What would be the reason for that failing?  Lack of implementation/testing, etc?

author: tersec
content: Every time it's happened it's been different in its specifics, so this is something that I'd like to hear from the relays rather than speculating

author: potuz
content: -- place here that line that I kept repeating for the last couple of years --

author: potuz
content: Yes, clients will circuit break Titan and not other builders. There's an argument that "rational" validators will fork clients to avoid this circuit breaking... I'm not going to get into that discussion

author: ben_a_adams
content:
Hasn't stopped/been fixed so far
